title: Bent's Old Fort National Historic Site: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Be A Junior Ranger         Kids as carpenters NPS  Upon your arrival at the fort, meet with a costumed Interpreter for a Junior Ranger Booklet. Fill out the pages and receive your Bent's Old Fort Junior Ranger Badge. You can print the Junior Ranger Booklet PDF on your own,but you will have to visit and experience the fort to be able to fill it out and to receive your Junior Ranger Badge.
